original_title: Bachelor Party Massacre: My Precious Revenge
overview: Someone's killing all of the Bachelor Party Girls, in a terrifying murdering spree filled with blood, gore, and mutilation. The Police are baffled, having not one clue as to who is brutally slaughtering these gorgeous, sexy, queens of erotica. They've become very frightened, and some may hang their G-Strings up forever! An action packed psycho-erotic thriller whose surprise ending has made it an international hit!
title: Bachelor Party Massacre: My Precious Revenge
